body:
Sorry, I plead ignorance to how X11 gets installed under various  
versions of Mac OS X.  Mine was pre-installed, I think.  There is a  
symbolic link from /usr/lib/X11R6 to X11 (in the same directory) on my  
machine, but I'm not sure how it got there.  There are only dynamic  
versions of the X11 libraries near as I can tell, so static linking  
for the purposes of binary distribution isn't supported.


Rob G's suggestion to recompile yourself is probably best.  Sorry I'm  
not more help.  Anyone else have a solution?


-Greg
___
